reviewText: there is an unrated version anyone have a clue how or were it can be fond?

Despite the fact that I bought this movie, I honestly have no idea how good it is.  I bought it strictly because Idaho's Governor, C.L. "Butch" Otter, has a small speaking part and have limited my viewing to his scene.  Butch looks good.  It's probably not a very good movie.
This movie was edited from it's original showing, leaving out some important scenes, had I know this at the time of purchse I would not have bought this dvd.
I actually produced some of the music for this movie & never saw it til now.
The packaging states this is an R-rated film, but the movie recorded on the enclosed disc should be rated PG (at best).

Why doesn't Hollywood make more Westerns?  I can't get enough, and I know that I'm not the only one out there.  Accordingly, I was very pleased to hear that A Time To Revenge was coming out on DVD.  Great action in the classic style.  Check it out!

The producers made this movie a sort of catchall for all interest, althought classified as a modern western. It includes some adventure, romance, music, violence, and yes--sex. Although it bears an "R" rating, I presume it must be for theme.  I had a little trouble stay tuned . Found in the bargain bin, as low budget movie, pick it up if you like and give it a try.
